description: Last week we brought you that sly character, Rodney, who got me to talk his buddy Lance into fucking him raw and bareback in Soldier's Ball 3: Bareback Waltz then took the money he made, split town with his girlfriend and headed for Florida, leaving Lance to pay their rent. This week, we bring you a very special solo of Lance in his Marine dress blues where he sits at my desk and tells me all about his time in Iraq. This is very interesting stuff as our hero gives us the inside scoop on sex in wartime. Will he break the longtime rule of 'what happens on the battlefield stays on the battlefied'? Find out as this sexy Marine eventually strips down and gives us one hell of a show after our battlefield sex education.
title: Lance
